channel.title: spiritual on So I Write
channel.description: Recent content in spiritual on So I Write

item.title: the sword of wisdom
item.description: It is quite often that sometimes you just could not stop yourself doing something. for instance, I often sit in chair and do not want to go the bathroom until i could not hold it any more… that happens especially when i try to solve a problem, resolving a program bug… so, how can we change this? use the sword of wisdom! the sword of wisdom, is a keen and sharp mind state that can penetrate in to your mind stream.

item.title: How to truly relax yourself
